mapper.insert: insert into MY_WED_OPTION (ID_WEDDING, ID_OPTION, ID_WEDDING_HALL, AM_PRICE, ID_REF) values (#{idWedding,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{idOption,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{idWeddingHall,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{amPrice,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{idRef,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.select: select ID_WEDDING, ID_OPTION, ID_WEDDING_HALL, AM_PRICE, ID_REF from MY_WED_OPTION

select A.ID_WEDDING, A.ID_OPTION, A.ID_WEDDING_HALL, A.AM_PRICE, A.ID_REF, B.DS_OPTION from MY_WED_OPTION A left join CD_WED_OPTION B ON A.ID_WEDDING_HALL = B.ID_WEDDING_HALL and A.ID_OPTION = B.ID_OPTION WHERE A.ID_WEDDING = #{idWedding,jdbcType=BIGINT}

select SUM(A.AM_PRICE) AS AM_PRICE from MY_WED_OPTION A left join CD_WED_OPTION B ON A.ID_WEDDING_HALL = B.ID_WEDDING_HALL and A.ID_OPTION = B.ID_OPTION WHERE A.ID_WEDDING = #{idWedding,jdbcType=BIGINT}
